data_table.description: Siting Blood Pressure, Exam 4. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: SBPD2
variable.description: [Tobacco and caffeine use]. Any tobacco today? Q2 [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 4]

variable.name: SBPD4
variable.description: [Tobacco and caffeine use]. Any caffeine today? Q4 [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 4]

variable.name: SBPD7
variable.description: [Preliminary measurement]. Cuff size. Q7 [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 4]

variable.name: SBPD1
variable.description: [Temperature]. Room temperature in Celsius Q1 [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 4]

variable.name: SBPD6
variable.description: [Preliminary measurement]. Right arm circumference (cm). Q6 [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 4]

variable.name: SBPD8
variable.description: [Preliminary measurement]. Heart rate (30 seconds). Q8 [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 4]

variable.name: SBPD10
variable.description: [Preliminary measurement]. Pulse obliteration pressure. Q10 [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 4]

variable.name: SBPD11
variable.description: [Preliminary measurement]. Maximum zero. Q11 [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 4]

variable.name: SBPD12
variable.description: [Preliminary measurement]. Peak inflation level. Q12 [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 4]

variable.name: SBPD13
variable.description: 1st systolic blood pressure measurement. Q13 [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 4]

variable.name: SBPD14
variable.description: 1st diastolic blood pressure measurement. Q14 [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 4]

variable.name: SBPD15
variable.description: 1st blood pressure measurement, zero reading. Q15 [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 4]

variable.name: SBPD16
variable.description: 2nd systolic blood pressure measurement. Q16 [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 4]

variable.name: SBPD17
variable.description: 2nd diastolic blood pressure measurement. Q17 [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 4]

variable.name: SBPD18
variable.description: 2nd blood pressure measurement, zero reading. Q18 [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 4]

variable.name: SBPD19
variable.description: 1st and 2nd systolic blood pressure average. Q19 [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 4]

variable.name: SBPD20
variable.description: 1st and 2nd diastolic blood pressure average. Q20 [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 4]

variable.name: SBPDFLAG
variable.description: 1=> SPBD form is present [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 4]

variable.name: SBPDCY
variable.description: Contact year [10] [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 4]

variable.name: SBPD3AMN
variable.description: [Tobacco and caffeine use]. Time in minutes since last use of tobacco [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 4]

variable.name: SBPD5AMN
variable.description: [Tobacco and caffeine use]. Time in minutes since last coffee, tea or chocolate [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 4]

variable.name: SBPD9AHM
variable.description: [Preliminary measurement]. Time of day of blood pressure measurement [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 4]

variable.name: GWAS_ID
variable.description: ARIC participant ID [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 4]
